title: Labor Day celebration honoring A. Philip Randolph (waving from balcony of Civic Arena), surrounded by clergy, including Rev. J. A. Williams, Rev. W. H. Horner, possibly Rev. LeRoy Patrick, Rev. Brannon J. Hopson, Rev. Charles H. Foggie, Rev. James B. Cayce, Rev. William Grove, Rev. Paul Easter, Bishop Frederick B. Newell, Bishop J. Gordon Howard, and Rev. Robert L. Kincheloe, Lower Hill District
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
provenance_text: The Estate of Charles H. Harris, Pittsburgh
